verbs.description: roy orbison hologram concert in l a invites awe and [V: debate] rocker roy orbison has been dead for nearly 30 years but on tuesday he performed at the wiltern for the first time in his storied career as a holographic image such images are becoming more common as families of deceased celebs look for new ways to prolong and capitalize on their legacies partner arts festival los angeles times tupac shakur l a laura zwicker orbison pezzuti fans california greenberg glusker roy orbison
